Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a buff-coloured pottery vessel, the fabric is light-brown in section, the interior is spotted with an off-white coloured deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and smudged traces of a red-painted text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394363) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394363)
